text: Hi, there is an option to include all properties, do you mean this?

Hi! Few days ago I encountered a Workflow trigger option in HubSpot  which I cannot find anymore :smile:
The option allowed to setup  a custom Webhook in order to trigger the workflow from the 3th party apps.
Can anyone still use it?
aha, then you need to add properties one by one
but i dont know  all properties, there might be custom properties also that will require we cant add all properties here
Yeah I don't think there is a way to include all properties at once. But you can read all properties included custom once in HubSpot properties settings.

Hey Levon! Can you send me your Hub ID, I can add you to the beta.

We are rolling it out over the next few weeks to everyone.

hey all! Wondering if anyone else has experienced this..

I reached out to support and summarized the issue within this loom video. Feel free to take a look:
<https://www.loom.com/share/1b6ede17ce6d48dda4ef50975dbabcb2?sid=b9cbcdfa-9d5f-4afe-81c9-4bf34be29eee>

*goal:* strip the “company domain name” of any extras like:
• www.
• http://
• https://
• etc
I’m trying to use the custom code feature via a workflow as explained in my loom video above. However, once I have it in an output variable (string) it won’t write to the company domain name field for some reason even though I believe it’s also a string type.

Anyone else work with that feature? I’m using node.js (javascript)

Hi Sierra!
I actually found it :+1:.
It is available only for contact based workflows.
So do you know if it will be extended for other object based workflows as well? (deal, company..)
